panels.title: Query Performance By Runtime Band A-F
panels.visualSettings: {"title":{"fontSize":14},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"","titleFontSize":9,"labelFontSize":9},"axisY":{"title":"","titleFontSize":9,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#6D8DA6","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#6D8DA6","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":9,"tickColor":"#E6EAED","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#E6EAED","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","minimum":0},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":9,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#6D8DA6","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#6D8DA6","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":9,"tickColor":"#E6EAED","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#E6EAED","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal"}},"legend":{"enabled":true,"verticalAlign":"bottom","fontSize":9,"maxHeight":15,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true},"series":{},"general":{"type":"area","displayType":"stackedPercent","markerSize":5,"lineDashType":"solid","markerType":"none","lineThickness":1,"fillOpacity":0.25,"mode":"timeSeries"},"color":{"family":"Categorical Default"},"overrides":[]}

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query {{{filter}}}
| timeslice by {{timeslice}}
| "F >10m" as band
| if (execution_duration_ms <= (1000 * 60 * 10),"E 5-10m",band) as band
| if (execution_duration_ms <= (1000 * 60 * 5),"D 1-5m",band) as band
| if (execution_duration_ms <= (1000 * 60 * 1),"C 30-60s",band) as band
| if (execution_duration_ms <= (1000 * 30),"B 10-30s",band) as band
| if (execution_duration_ms <= (1000 * 10),"A <10s",band) as band
| count by band,_timeslice | transpose row _timeslice column band

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query {{{filter}}}
query_type="interactive search"

| if(execution_duration_ms < 1000 * {{slow_seconds}},1,0) as fast
| count as searches, sum(fast) as fast 
| 100 * (fast/searches) as fast_search_pct | avg( fast_search_pct)

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query {{{filter}}}
query_type="interactive dashboard"

| if(execution_duration_ms < 1000 * {{slow_seconds}},1,0) as fast
| count as searches, sum(fast) as fast 
| 100 * (fast/searches) as fast_search_pct | avg( fast_search_pct)

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query {{{filter}}}
( query_type=monitor* or query_type=schedul*)

| if(execution_duration_ms < 1000 * {{slow_seconds}},1,0) as fast
| count as searches, sum(fast) as fast 
| 100 * (fast/searches) as fast_search_pct | avg( fast_search_pct)

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query {{{filter}}}
| where execution_duration_ms > 30000
| (query_end_time - query_start_time)/1000 as range_s
| round(range_s/60/60/24) as range_day
| range_s/60 as range_min
| execution_duration_ms /1000 as duration_s
// AGGREGATE TO GET STATS
| substring(query,0,{{search_max_chrs}}) as query
| values(range_day) as range_days,avg(range_min) as range_minutes,avg(scanned_partition_count) as partitions, sum(duration_s) as total_s,count as searches, sum(data_scanned_bytes) as bytes_scanned, sum(retrieved_message_count) as retrieved_events, avg(duration_s) as avg_duration_s by query_type,user_name,query
| sort total_s | limit 100

panels.title: Median runtime seconds by type
panels.visualSettings: {"title":{"fontSize":14},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"","titleFontSize":9,"labelFontSize":9},"axisY":{"title":"","titleFontSize":9,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#6D8DA6","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#6D8DA6","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":9,"tickColor":"#E6EAED","logarithmic":true,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"s","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#E6EAED","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal"},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":9,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#6D8DA6","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#6D8DA6","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":9,"tickColor":"#E6EAED","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"s","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#E6EAED","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal"}},"legend":{"enabled":true,"verticalAlign":"bottom","fontSize":9,"maxHeight":400,"showAsTable":true,"wrap":true,"shownStatistics":["sum","avg"]},"series":{},"overrides":[],"general":{"type":"line","displayType":"default","markerSize":5,"lineDashType":"solid","markerType":"none","lineThickness":1,"mode":"timeSeries"},"color":{"family":"Categorical Default"}}

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query {{{filter}}}
//| where execution_duration_ms > 30000
| (query_end_time - query_start_time)/1000 as range_s
| execution_duration_ms /1000 as duration_s
| if(execution_duration_ms > 1000 * {{slow_seconds}},1,0) as slow
| if(status_message = "Finished successfully",0,1) as fail
// AGGREGATE TO GET STATS
| count_distinct(user_name) as users,count as queries,sum(duration_s) as total_sec,count as searches, sum(data_scanned_bytes) as bytes_scanned, sum(retrieved_message_count) as events, pct(duration_s,50) as median_run_s , sum(slow) as %"slow > 30s", sum(fail) as %"fail/cancelled" by query_type
| sort bytes_scanned
| bytes_scanned / 1024/1024/1024 as scan_gb 
| total_sec / (60 * 60) as total_hours | fields -bytes_scanned,total_sec

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query {{{filter}}}
( query_type=*api*)

| if(execution_duration_ms < 1000 * {{slow_seconds}},1,0) as fast
| count as searches, sum(fast) as fast 
| 100 * (fast/searches) as fast_search_pct | avg( fast_search_pct)

panels.title: Top Users By Total Runtime
panels.visualSettings: {"title":{"fontSize":14},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"","titleFontSize":9,"labelFontSize":9},"axisY":{"title":"","titleFontSize":9,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#6D8DA6","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#6D8DA6","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":9,"tickColor":"#E6EAED","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#E6EAED","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal"},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":9,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#6D8DA6","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#6D8DA6","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":9,"tickColor":"#E6EAED","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#E6EAED","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal"}},"legend":{"enabled":true,"verticalAlign":"bottom","fontSize":9,"maxHeight":35,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true},"series":{},"general":{"type":"line","displayType":"default","markerSize":5,"lineDashType":"solid","markerType":"none","lineThickness":1,"mode":"timeSeries"},"color":{"family":"Categorical Default"},"overrides":[]}

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query {{{filter}}}
| timeslice by {{timeslice}}
|sum(execution_duration_ms) as execution_duration_ms   by _timeslice,user_name
| total execution_duration_ms as ts by _timeslice
 | execution_duration_ms / ts as f | if (f <.005,"other",user_name) as user_name
| sum(execution_duration_ms) as execution_duration_ms by _timeslice,user_name
| fillmissing timeslice(15m) with 0 for	execution_duration_ms 
| replace (user_name,/@.+/,"") as user_name | transpose row _timeslice column user_name

panels.title: Overall Search Performance
panels.text:
In these panels:
- total scan
- toetal searches executed
- search peformance into range bands. A < 10 seconds being best and F > 10 minutes being the worst.

panels.title: Benchmark < 30s runtime
panels.text: In these panels we report search performance for < {{slow_seconds}} seconds (fast) vs > {{slow_seconds}} seconds (slow).

panels.title: Search Statistics
panels.text: Below are panels to show all searches run, as well as trends over time for median runtime, user runtime.

panels.title: Optimisation: Problem Searches - Slowest Total Runtime
panels.text:
These searches have the highest total runtime in the account so are the most likely to benefit from search optimization.

Key tips to speed up search:
- include a _sourcecategory
- add one or more indexes ```_index=abc``` or ```(_index=abc or _index=xyz)```
- include a few keywords or keyword strings rather as well as using ```where matches ...``` or ```parse ...``` without nodrop to filter.

For more help see: [search best practices](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/search/get-started-with-search/build-search/best-practices-search)

panels.title: Fast and Slow Searches
panels.visualSettings: {"title":{"fontSize":14},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"","titleFontSize":9,"labelFontSize":9},"axisY":{"title":"","titleFontSize":9,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#6D8DA6","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#6D8DA6","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":9,"tickColor":"#E6EAED","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#E6EAED","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal"},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":9,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#6D8DA6","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#6D8DA6","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":9,"tickColor":"#E6EAED","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#E6EAED","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal"}},"legend":{"enabled":true,"verticalAlign":"bottom","fontSize":9,"maxHeight":50,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true},"series":{},"overrides":[],"general":{"type":"area","displayType":"stacked","markerSize":5,"lineDashType":"solid","markerType":"none","lineThickness":1,"fillOpacity":0.25,"mode":"timeSeries"},"color":{"family":"Categorical Default"}}

panels.title: About
panels.text:
This dashboard uses the [search audit index](https://help.sumologic.com/Manage/Security/Search_Audit_Index) to show volume and performance of searches in your Sumo Logic account, as well as enable you to easily locate the worst performaning searches that might benefit from optimization.

Filters:
- **filter**: any search term appended to line 1 of the query such as: ```query_type=interactive*``` or ```user_name=jane.doe*```. Search audit is a view not raw data so you must filter on view columns not keywords. Columns include: ```analytics_tier, capacity_used, daily_capacity, data_retrieved_bytes, data_scanned_bytes, execution_duration_ms, is_aggregate, query, query_end_time, query_start_time, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_bytes_breakdown, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name,```
- **timeslice**: enter a timeslice value for the time series panels
- **slow_seconds**: a number of seconds to measure a query as slow vs fast.
- **search_max_chrs**: reduces length of search displayed in detailed tables

panels.title: Gb Scan Top Users
panels.visualSettings: {"title":{"fontSize":14},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"","titleFontSize":9,"labelFontSize":9},"axisY":{"title":"","titleFontSize":9,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#6D8DA6","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#6D8DA6","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":9,"tickColor":"#E6EAED","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"GB","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#E6EAED","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal"},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":9,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#6D8DA6","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#6D8DA6","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":9,"tickColor":"#E6EAED","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#E6EAED","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal"}},"legend":{"enabled":true,"verticalAlign":"bottom","fontSize":9,"maxHeight":35,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true},"series":{},"color":{"family":"Categorical Default"},"overrides":[],"general":{"type":"column","displayType":"stacked","roundDataPoints":true,"fillOpacity":1,"mode":"timeSeries"}}

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query {{{filter}}}
| timeslice by {{timeslice}}
|sum(data_scanned_bytes) as bytes   by _timeslice,user_name
| total bytes as tb by _timeslice
 | bytes / tb as f | if (f <.03,"other",user_name) as user_name
| bytes / 1G as gb
| sum(gb) as gb_scan by _timeslice,user_name | replace (user_name,/@.+/,"") as user_name  
| fillmissing timeslice(15m) with 0 for	gb_scan | transpose row _timeslice column user_name

panels.title: Problem Searches - Highest Scan GB
panels.text:
These searches have the highest total scanned bytes in the account so are the most likely to benefit from search optimization.

If partition count is high add _index=<index> to search to ensure correct scoping. Using _sourcecategory may automatically scope search but not in all cases.

For more help see: [search best practices](https://help.sumologic.com/docs/search/get-started-with-search/build-search/best-practices-search)

panels.title: Highest Scan Searches > 15s by total Scan GB

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query {{{filter}}}
| where execution_duration_ms > 15000
| (query_end_time - query_start_time)/1000 as range_s
| round(range_s/60/60/24) as range_day
| range_s/60 as range_min
| execution_duration_ms /1000 as duration_s
// AGGREGATE TO GET STATS
| substring(query,0,{{search_max_chrs}}) as query
| values(range_day) as range_days,avg(range_min) as range_minutes,avg(scanned_partition_count) as partitions, sum(duration_s) as total_s,count as searches, sum(data_scanned_bytes) as bytes_scanned, sum(retrieved_message_count) as retrieved_events, avg(duration_s) as avg_duration_s by query_type,user_name,query
| sort  bytes_scanned
| bytes_scanned / 1G as gb_scan
| limit 100
| fields -bytes_scanned

panels.title: Top Users By Total Runtime Hours

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query {{{filter}}}
//( query_type=*view*)

| sum(data_scanned_bytes) as bytes | bytes / (1024 * 1024 * 1024 ) as GB_Scan 
// make a lookup reference object of the last 24 hour scan total
| "YES" as dummy
| where [subquery from=(-24h): 
  _index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="view_and_tier_volume"
  | parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi 
  | json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as index, dataTier, bytes, count   
  | sum(bytes) as bytes | bytes/1024/1024/1024 as gb
  | 1 as key
  | save /temp/ingest
  | "YES" as dummy | compose dummy
]
| 1 as key
| lookup gb from /temp/ingest on key=key
| gb_scan / gb as scan_ratio | fields scan_ratio

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="view_and_tier_volume"
  | parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi 
  | json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as index, dataTier, bytes, count   
  | sum(bytes) as bytes | bytes/1024/1024/1024 /1024 as tb
| avg(tb) as ingest

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query {{{filter}}}
status_message="Query Failed"
| (query_end_time - query_start_time)/1000 as range_s
| round(range_s/60/60/24) as range_day
| round(range_s/60/60,1) as range_hour
//| range_s/60 as range_min
| execution_duration_ms /1000 as duration_s
// AGGREGATE TO GET STATS
| substring(query,0,{{search_max_chrs}}) as query
| values(range_hour) as ranges_hours, values(range_day) as ranges_days,sum(duration_s) as total_s,count as searches, sum(data_scanned_bytes) as bytes_scanned,  avg(duration_s) as avg_duration_s by query_type,user_name,query,status_message,analytics_tier
| sort  bytes_scanned
| bytes_scanned / 1G as gb_scan
| fields -bytes_scanned
